componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Hello {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},

That feeling of satisfaction when you provide your customer with a product that brings them to the next level never gets old. Our Hydrogel-Free bio-sensing technology is one of those products that will help you achieve that satisfaction.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Compared to the 50-year-old hydrogel technology, OMNI-WAVE™ 
  • Eliminates hydrogel-associated skin reactions
  • Enhances performance and stability 
  • Reduces waste due to evaporation
  • Eliminates the need for expensive packaging
The OMNI-WAVE™ technology is ready to be licensed to OEMs for incorporation into their finished devices.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Watch our OMNI-WAVE™ video for more information and start a conversation with our OMNI-WAVE™ expert.

{{{Sender.Signature}}}
